display_long_description:
#                                                                                                                                                                                                      
[media]
# Train With the Pros
VR Dodgeball Trainer was built from the ground up by professional dodgeball players to give you the dodging prowess to survive out on the court.

**Customize Your Training**
- Change the # of opponents
- Control throw speed
- Increase # of opponents throwing at once
- Bring opponents to court front or back
- Enable 360 mode

[media]
# Watch Out!
Watch out as these red menaces soar over your dome, leaving you constantly on your toes. Can you take on waves of enemies as the pressure rises?

[media]
# Slash?
Yeah this gym has swords, guns, and much more! Hop into arcade mode and play around with our stupidly fun mini-game modes! Take on a range of unexpected challenges while the waves get harder and harder.

**Arcade Gamemodes**
- Saber Mode
- Bullet Time Mode
- Shield Mode
- Gun Mode
- Curveball Mode
- Big Balls Mode

# Train With the Pros
VR Dodgeball Trainer was built from the ground up by professional dodgeball players to give you the dodging prowess to survive out on the court.

**Customize Your Training**
- Change the # of opponents
- Control throw speed
- Increase # of opponents throwing at once
- Bring opponents to court front or back
- Enable 360 mode

![{"height":320,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499293121_1495116278199889_771028035941867829_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=ZWjsqXxSgZ8Q7kNvwEtaUvV&_nc_oc=Admd1vOMbIRE5nGPWIBifDKultNzi5EICe_LBYUz0Cr3acANKrKil9Jg4747mfhgUto&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=KQAVb1G6_0ueofEaofquew&oh=00_Afu0Sw0HJerNvJ3MPPDJpxyURJoa2WVd7ropeoWVYaT-EA&oe=69964C38)
# Watch Out!
Watch out as these red menaces soar over your dome, leaving you constantly on your toes. Can you take on waves of enemies as the pressure rises?

# Slash?
Yeah this gym has swords, guns, and much more! Hop into arcade mode and play around with our stupidly fun mini-game modes! Take on a range of unexpected challenges while the waves get harder and harder.

**Arcade Gamemodes**
- Saber Mode
- Bullet Time Mode
- Shield Mode
- Gun Mode
- Curveball Mode
- Big Balls Mode
